item.title: Vinesauce || Joel || Hardcore Fridays: Black Mesa ( brutally hard difficulty )
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
Xeoxer:

I have a shitty PC myself and despite this, if you are skilled you shouldn’t have major difficulties just beating the game. For example, it lagged quite badly in the section with a shitload of HECUs and a tank just after the cliffside section, and it’s one of the hardest moments in the game.

FUCK THAT SECTION. It’s when you come up from the drains after the cliffs and there’s a tank and a fuckton of HECU. Come up from the pipe, lag spike, then immediate one shot kill from resident HECU fuckwits.

I really hope the commercial version fixes that sequence. I must have died there at least twenty times.
